SELECT
store.id id, category.name categoryName, category.className categoryClassName, store.name name, thumbnail, detail, content, address, url, visitors,
FROM store INNER JOIN category ON categoryId = category.id WHERE (useEat = 0 OR useEat & #{type} = #{type})
AND categoryId IN #{category}

SELECT
store.id id, category.name categoryName, category.className categoryClassName, store.name name, detail, content, thumbnail, address, url, visitors, categoryId, useEat, GROUP_CONCAT(image SEPARATOR '|') images
FROM store INNER JOIN category ON categoryId = category.id INNER JOIN store_image ON store.id = storeId WHERE store.id = #{id}
GROUP BY store.id
